data.name: RPG Maker MV - Time Fantasy: Farm and Fort
data.detailed_description:
A graphics expansion with fresh tilesets and icons in the crisp pixels of the Time Fantasy style! Expand your world with all the essentials for farms and forts-- loot, weapons, crops, and more! Complete your collection with over 300 icons!

Create farms with new tiles for houses and barns, and a variety of crops will bring them to life with multiple stages of growth. Build forts with spiked fences, tents and huts. Defenses and cages can build a soldier's encampment or even an orcish village! Expand on your world's locations with much-requested graphics for jail cells and tent interiors. This pack also includes 335 ICONS in the Time Fantasy style-- icons for skills, items, weapons, equipment, loot, UI elements and more!

Features:

  • Retro pixel art to match all Time Fantasy graphics.
  • 5 new tilesets!
  • A wide variety of grops with images for different stages of growth.
  • Iconset with 335 icons -- skills, items, equipment, loot and more!
  • Compatible with RMMV

data.short_description: Expand your world with all the essentials for farms and forts-- loot, weapons, crops, and more!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
